title: How to delete a playlist on Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: Spotify is really great app for music if you have premium because those ads uhhhh there are annoying as hell. Lets come to your question, if you want to delete the whole playlist then here is the step by step easy process. • Do long press on the playlist you want to delete .  • After that you will se some options like this.(below screenshot) • And there you can see DELETE PLAYLIST option, click on it.  • When you click on delete option,the pop-up box like this will appear. Then click on delete and boom now your playlist is deleted.  Screenshots are from my SPOTIFY account. Images source : My Gallary Hope you found your solution. Charan
